nodes.text: Celegia was an astronomical object located in the regions known as the Expansion Region and the Slice. It was also situated in the grid square O-10 of the Standard Galactic Grid.

Celegia was introduced in the current Star Wars canon in the fifty-second issue of Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, which was published around December 30, 2015. The world Celegia was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first indirectly mentioned in the 2002 Power of the Jedi Sourcebook, which was published by Wizards of the Coast for use with the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was subsequently first named in the 2003 Star Wars Roleplaying Game sourcebook Ultimate Alien Anthology.
